mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, IS_ENABLED, ACCOUNT_ID, NICKNAME) VALUES (#{memberId},#{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, 1, MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT PHONE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT MS.GRADE FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEMBERSHIP MS ON M.MEMBER_ID = MS.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE PHONE = #{phone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SOCIAL(ACCOUNT_ID, SOCIAL_ID, PROVIDER, EMAIL) VALUES(#{accountId}, #{socialId}, #{provider}, #{email})
